transArray.content: The room I booked for a business trip is very close to the destination. It is only a ten-minute walk away. It is very convenient. The customer service attitude at the front desk is very enthusiastic and soft-spoken and friendly. The room is also very clean. I have sensitive constitution and I did not feel uncomfortable this time. It is great to have a robot from other places come to my door. !

Dear customer! Thank you very much for choosing Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. We always believe that a good reputation must be recommended from the most sincere satisfaction of the guests. Your support and recognition are very important to us. Detailed service has always been A long-standing focus of ours, we are honored to provide you with the highest quality service. We very much welcome you to choose our hotel again whether you are on a business trip or traveling. We sincerely look forward to your visit again and wish you a happy life! Manager: Zhang Lijuan
